title: What is the best alternative to Cisco switches? - Quora

response.answer_text: You might find it useful to read reviews of the top user-ranked alternatives to Cisco Switches on IT Central Station: Read the Latest Reviews for the Top Ethernet Switches Vendors Based on the user review on IT Central Station, NETGEAR Switches is Cisco’s main competitor (rated #1 in the Ethernet Switches category followed by Cisco Switches at #2). You can read the user reviews to see whether this option is well suited to your needs. As an example, one reviewer says “It's super-easy to use and deploy, probably one of the easiest managed switches I've ever used. I can have it pre-programmed and configured right through the web interface before I even plug it into the customer's site.” Determining which is the ‘best’ option is typically dependent on what your particular needs are. By reading through the pros and cons of this and other products, you should gain insight into which product is best for your individual requirements.
